SELECT QPAI.PLNT_CD, QPAI.ANS_IDX, QPAP.RCP_DT, NVL(QPAI.EMG_YN, 'N') AS EMG_YN, QPAP.ANS_NO, QPAP.REQ_DT, QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX, QPI.PITM_TYP, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPI.PITM_TYP) AS PITM_TYP_NM, QPI.PITM_CD, QPI.PITM_NM, QPAR.LOT_NO, QPAP.REQ_RMK, QPAP.RCP_RMK, QPAP.ASS_SPCC, QPAR.MAK_DT, QPAR.ETR_DT, QPAR.SPL_LOT_NO, QPAR.USE_LMT, QPAP.CLLT_RMK, QPAP.CLLT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = QPAP.CLLT_UID) AS CLLT_NM, QPAP.CLLT_DT, QPAP.CPL_RQM_DT, QPAP.ASS_NO, QPAP.ASS_DT, QPAR.SPL_CD, QPAR.SPL_NM, QPAP.REQ_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = QPAP.REQ_UID) AS REQ_NM, QPAP.REQ_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = QPAP.REQ_DPT_CD) AS REQ_DPT_NM, QPAR.ETR_QTY, QPAR.INP_UNIT, QPAP.RJT_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = QPAP.RJT_UID) AS RJT_NM, TO_CHAR(QPAP.RJT_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RJT_DT, QPAP.RJT_REA, QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD) AS ANS_PROC_NM, QPAP.OOS_YN, QPAP.REVW_CMMT, QPAP.SYT_JDG, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAP.SYT_JDG) AS SYT_JDG_NM, QPAP.REVW_DT, QPI.PITM_EN, QPAP.RST_APR_REQ_IDX, QPAP.HLD_YN, TO_CHAR(QPAP.HLD_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HLD_DT, QPAP.HLD_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = QPAP.HLD_UID) AS HLD_NM, QPAP.HLD_REA, QPAI.ANS_FILE_IDX AS FILE_IDX, ((SELECT COUNT(FILE_SRLNO) FROM SY_FILE_INFO SFI WHERE SFI.FILE_IDX = QPAI.ANS_FILE_IDX AND SFI.DEL_YN = 'N') || '건') AS FILE_CNT, QPI.CRG_DPT_CD, (SELECT DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT WHERE DPT_CD = QPI.CRG_DPT_CD) AS CRG_DPT_NM FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD AND QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER JOIN QM_PITM_INFO QPI ON QP.PLNT_CD = QPI.PLNT_CD AND QP.PITM_CD = QPI.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QPI.PITM_VER JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.REQ_IDX = QPAR.REQ_IDX WHERE QPAP.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD != 'S0230004'
AND QPAP.HLD_YN = 'Y'
AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD = 'S0131000'
AND QPI.PITM_TYP = #{pitmTyp}
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPI.PITM_CD)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{pitmCd})) || '%')
AND QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD = #{ansProcCd}
AND QPAP.SYT_JDG = #{sytJdg}
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPI.PITM_NM)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{pitmNm})) || '%')
AND TRIM(UPPER(QPAP.ANS_NO)) LIKE ('%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{ansNo})) || '%')
AND TO_DATE(QPAP.REQ_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{reqDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{reqDtList[1]})
AND TO_DATE(QPAP.RCP_DT) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{rcpDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{rcpDtList[1]})
ORDER BY QPAP.RCP_DT DESC

SELECT QPAP.PLNT_CD, QPAP.REQ_IDX, QPAP.ANS_IDX, QPAR.RST_FILE_IDX AS FILE_IDX, QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX, MA2.AITM_CD, MA2.AITM_KN, QPAR.ANS_DPT_CD, (SELECT SD.DPT_NM FROM SY_DPT SD WHERE SD.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SD.DPT_CD = QPAR.ANS_DPT_CD) AS ANS_DPT_NM, QPAR.ANS_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER SU WHERE SU.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND SU.USER_ID = QPAR.ANS_UID) AS ANS_NM, QPAR.PERSPEC_TXT, QPAR.OWC_SPEC_TXT, QPAR.SPEC_TYP, (SELECT SCD.DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SCD.DTL_CD = QPAR.SPEC_TYP) AS SPEC_TYP_NM, QPAR.JDG_TYP, (SELECT SCD.DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL SCD WHERE SCD.DTL_CD = QPAR.JDG_TYP) AS JDG_TYP_NM, (DECODE(SUBSTR(QPAR.RST_VAL, 0, 4), 'U008', (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAR.RST_VAL AND PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD), RST_VAL)) AS RST_VAL, QPAR.MARK_VAL, QPAR.RST_UNIT_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAR.RST_UNIT_CD) AS RST_UNIT_NM, QPAR.RPT_PRT_ITM_NM, QPAR.RST_JDG, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAR.RST_JDG) AS RST_JDG_NM, QPAR.RPT_PRT_SLV_VAL, QPAR.RST_RMK, QPAR.ANS_RST_INP_DS, QPAR.RST_DPNT, QPAR.PER_SLV_LOW, QPAR.PER_SLV_UPP, QPAR.PER_SLV_DESC, QPAR.OWC_SLV_LOW, QPAR.OWC_SLV_UPP, QPAR.OWC_SLV_DESC, QPAR.RPT_PRT_YN, QPAP.ANS_PROC_CD, QPAR.RST_PROC_CD, QPAP.ANS_NO, QPAR2.LOT_NO, QPAR2.BATCH_NO, MA1.AMITM_CD, NVL(QPAR2.PHS_ORDER_NO, QPAR2.PDT_ORDER_NO) AS ORDER_NO, QPAR.SLV_JDG_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAR.SLV_JDG_CFM) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NM, QPAR.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DTL_CD = QPAR.SLV_JDG_NON_CFM) AS SLV_JDG_CFM_NON_NM, ((SELECT COUNT(FILE_SRLNO) FROM SY_FILE_INFO WHERE FILE_IDX = QPAR.RST_FILE_IDX AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD) || '건') AS FILE_CNT, QPAR.MKR_QTY, QPAR.AITM_RMK FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC QPAP JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_INFO QPAI ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAI.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.ANS_IDX = QPAI.ANS_IDX JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_RST QPAR ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAR.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.ANS_IDX = QPAR.ANS_IDX JOIN QM_PITM_SPEC QPS ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPS.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.PITM_SPEC_IDX = QPS.PITM_SPEC_IDX JOIN QM_PITM QP ON QPS.PLNT_CD = QP.PLNT_CD AND QPS.PITM_CD = QP.PITM_CD AND QPS.PITM_VER = QP.PITM_VER JOIN QM_PITM_INFO ON QP.PLNT_CD = QM_PITM_INFO.PLNT_CD AND QP.PITM_CD = QM_PITM_INFO.PITM_CD AND QP.PITM_VER = QM_PITM_INFO.PITM_VER JOIN QT_PITM_ANS_REQ QPAR2 ON QPAP.PLNT_CD = QPAR2.PLNT_CD AND QPAP.REQ_IDX = QPAR2.REQ_IDX JOIN MS_AMITM MA1 ON MA1.AMITM_CD = QPAR.AMITM_CD JOIN MS_AITM MA2 ON MA1.AITM_CD = MA2.AITM_CD WHERE QPAR.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND QPAR.DEL_YN = 'N' AND QPAR.ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx} ORDER BY QPAR.RST_SEQ
